p: For this data set, our likelihood-mapping analysis revealed a strong phylogenetic signal (Supplementary Fig. S2). The correlation between root-to-tip distances and sampling year indicated a relative strong temporal signal ( R 2 = 0.307), with an estimated substitution rate of 1.64 × 10 −3 substitutions per site per year and the time to the most recent common ancestor of July 2003 (Supplementary Fig. S3).
